mapper.select: SELECT P.SEQ, P.TARGET_USER_SEQ, P.TITLE, P.LOCATION, P.STATUS, P.TO_DATE, P.FROM_DATE, P.TOTAL_COST, P.REG_DATE, P.LAST_UPDATED, P.PAPER, P.RANGE, (SELECT NAME FROM TRAVELER T WHERE T.SEQ = P.TARGET_USER_SEQ) AS NAME FROM PLANER P, COTRAVELER C WHERE (P.SEQ = C.TARGET_PLANER_SEQ AND C.TARGET_USER_SEQ=#{seq}) AND P.STATUS NOT IN(3, 4) ORDER BY P.REG_DATE DESC
